venue.name: Marge's Coffee, Sandwich & Ice Cream Shop

item.description:
5/20/10
I dropped by there tonight to remind them that
I am going there at 4:00 on Saturday afternoon.
They said to tell my Meet Up Members that they
Have Home Made Ice Cream there.

If you have time and are in the neighborhood, then
please drop by.

***********************************

I have driven by this location thousands of times but
Did not stop there before. I was too worried about the
Traffic behind me.

On Sunday, March 28th,
for a possible Meet Up location,
I went into Marge’s Coffee, Sandwich and Ice Cream
Shop.

There is parking in the back of the Shop.
The best seating is at the Shop’s Outside Patio.
There is a little bit of seating inside but I hope that we have
Great weather to sit outside.
It has a country & rustic atmosphere.

It is on Rte 110 North of “The Dock” Shopping Center.
Just beyond the train tracks bridge on the right hand side.

When I get a guestimate count of how many might be coming, then
I will let them know so that they can be somewhat prepared.

A,

http://www.superpages...


www.superpages.com/bp/Stratford-CT/Marges-Coffee-Sandwich-and-Ice-Cream-Shoppe-L0144033357.htm?SRC=amertowniyp&lbp=1&PGID=yp255.8085.1270523882514.25614801439&bidType=FLCLIK&TR=77

B.

item.how_to_find_us: I will have a purple backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk Visits Marge’s Coffee Shop in Stratford
